bm_desc: Revised Intimation of Board Meeting Pursuant to Regulation 29 ofSEBI(LODR) Regulation, 2015.

This is to inform you that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on Wednesday, 17th July 2024, inter alia, to consider the following: 1. Approval of audited standalone financial results of the Company for the quarter ending 30th June 2024; and 2. Approval of unaudited consolidated financial results of the Company for the quarter ending 30th June 2024.
To consider and approve the financial results for the period ended Jun 30, 2024

To consider and approve allotment of Bonus shares
To consider and approve the financial results for the period ended Jun 30, 2024 and other business matters
